articles.title: Las Vegas ballpark pitch revives debate over public funding for sports stadiums
articles.description: CARSON CITY, Nev. (AP) — Gov. Joe Lombardo wants to help build Major League Baseball's smallest ballpark, arguing that the worst team in baseball can boost Las Vegas, a city striving to call itself a sports mecca.
